喉仏: (のどぼとけ) - {anat} laryngeal prominence; Adam's apple

喉元過ぎれば熱さを忘れる: (のどもとすぎればあつさをわすれる) - (proverb) danger past and God forgotten; once on shore, we pray no more; once it's past the throat, one forgets the heat (of the swallowed object)
喉自慢: (のどじまん) - singing contest; person proud of their voice
喉赤蜂鳥: (ノドアカハチドリ) - ruby-throated hummingbird (Archilochus colubris)
喉越: (のどごし) - (often of beer) feeling of food or drink going down one's throat
喉越し: (のどごし) - (often of beer) feeling of food or drink going down one's throat
喉越しの良い: (のどごしのよい) - (esp. of beer) going down smoothly; tasting good going down
喉輪: (のどわ) - {sumo} thrust at the opponent's throat
喉頭癌: (こうとうがん) - cancer of the larynx
喉頭蓋軟骨: (こうとうがいなんこつ) - epiglottic cartilage
喉頭隆起: (こうとうりゅうき) - laryngeal prominence; Adam's Apple

喋々喃々: (ちょうちょうなんなん) - (yoji) billing and cooing; holding an intimate, long-winded conversation in whispers
喋くり: (しゃべくり) - chatting without a break/talking without pause; amusing two-person dialogue (form of stand-up comedy)
喋くる: (しゃべくる) - to chat enthusiastically; to chatter; to talk on and on
喋り捲る: (しゃべりまくる) - to talk on and on; to talk one's head off
喋る: (しゃべる) - to talk; to chat; to chatter
喋喋喃喃: (ちょうちょうなんなん) - (yoji) billing and cooing; holding an intimate, long-winded conversation in whispers
喘ぎ喘ぎ: (あえぎあえぎ) - gasping; breathing heavily
喘ぐ: (あえぐ) - to gasp/breathe hard; to suffer/to struggle
喘息が起こる: (ぜんそくがおこる) - to have an attack of asthma
喘鳴: (ぜんめい) - stridor; wheezing; noisy breathing
喚き散らす: (わめきちらす) - to rant and rave; to raise hell
喚き立てる: (わめきたてる) - to yell; to bawl out
喚び出す: (よびだす) - to summon/to call (e.g. phone)/to convene/to decoy/to lure; to invoke (e.g. subroutine)/to call/to open (e.g. a file)
喚び起こす: (よびおこす) - to wake someone (by calling for them)/to awaken; to call (to mind)/to remember
喚び起す: (よびおこす) - to wake someone (by calling for them)/to awaken; to call (to mind)/to remember
喚ぶ: (よぶ) - to call out (to)/to call/to invoke; to summon (a doctor, etc.); to invite; to designate/to name/to brand; to garner (support, etc.)/to gather; to take as one's wife
喚呼: (かんこ) - verbal check (esp. on railroads); verbal confirmation
喚子鳥: (よぶこどり) - calling bird (esp. a cuckoo)
喜がる: (よがる) - to satisfy oneself; to feel satisfied; to be proud
喜ばしい: (よろこばしい) - delightful; joyous; happy
喜ばす: (よろこばす) - to delight; to give pleasure
喜び: (yorokobi) - alegria, deleite, êxtase, prazer, gratificação, regozijo, parabéns, felicitações
喜びに輝く目: (よろこびにかがやくめ) - eyes sparkling with joy
喜び事: (よろこびごと) - auspicious event; celebration
喜び勇む: (よろこびいさむ) - to be in high spirits
喜ぶ: (yorokobu) - estar encantado, estar feliz, estar satisfeito; congratular-se, estar encantado, estar feliz, estar satisfeito; congratular-se; aceitar com gratidão
喜寿: (きじゅ) - (a variant of 喜 looks like 七十七 ) 77th birthday
喜怒: (きど) - joy and anger; human emotions
喜怒哀楽: (きどあいらく) - (yoji) human emotions (joy, anger, pathos, and humor) (humour)
喜望峰: (きぼうほう) - Cape of Good Hope
喜歌う: (よろこびうたう) - to rejoice and sing
喜知次: (キチジ) - broadbanded thornyhead (Sebastolobus macrochir); broadfin thornyhead; kichiji rockfish
喜色: (きしょく) - glad countenance; joyful look
喜色満面: (きしょくまんめん) - (yoji) being all smiles with joy
喜雨: (きう) - friendly shower; welcome rain; rain that comes after a drought
喝: (katsu) - hoarse , exclamation used to scold practitioners (no Zen); scolding or threatening with a shout
喝を入れる: (かつをいれる) - to apply the art of resuscitation (in judo, etc.); to breathe life into/to stimulate/to encourage someone/to give someone a pep talk
喝上げ: (かつあげ) - extortion of money or goods (e.g. from lower year students); shakedown
喝破: (kappa) - arguing someone down, scolding, rebuking; proclaiming (a verdade), expounding
喝采をおくる: (かっさいをおくる) - to applaud; to cheer (for)
喝采を送る: (かっさいをおくる) - to applaud; to cheer (for)

喝食行者: (かっしきあんじゃ) - meal announcer (at a Zen monastery)

喧々諤々: (けんけんがくがく) - tumultuous (with everyone voicing their opinions simultaneously); uproarious
喧しい: (かまびすしい) - (八釜しい is an ateji created by 夏目漱石) noisy/boisterous; (やかましい only) strict/faultfinding/carping/fussy
喧伝: (けんでん) - spreading around (news, etc.); talking about widely
喧喧囂囂: (けんけんごうごう) - (yoji) wild uproar/pandemonium/clamor of voices/tumult; noisy/uproarious/clamorous
喧喧諤諤: (けんけんがくがく) - tumultuous (with everyone voicing their opinions simultaneously); uproarious

喧嘩をふっかける: (けんかをふっかける) - to pick a fight
喧嘩を吹っかける: (けんかをふっかける) - to pick a fight
喧嘩を吹っ掛ける: (けんかをふっかける) - to pick a fight
喧嘩を売る: (けんかをうる) - to pick a fight
